brief: Draws an ellipse (oval) in the display window.
name: ellipse()
description: Draws an ellipse (oval) to the screen. An ellipse with equal width and height is a circle. By default, the first two parameters set the location, and the third and fourth parameters set the shape's width and height. The origin may be changed with the ellipseMode() function.

parameters.name: graphics
parameters.description: any object of the type PGraphics

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: width of the ellipse by default

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: height of the ellipse by default
